___gatewayTimestamp.description: Timestamp upon receipt at the gateway. If present, this property will be overwritten by the gateway; submitters are not intended to populate this property.

___message.description: Contains all properties from the listed events in the client's journal minus Localised strings and the properties marked below as 'disallowed'

___name.description: Commodity name as returned by the MarketSell entry in the Journal

___sellPrice.description: Price to sell to the market

___prohibited.description: Whether the commodity is prohibited at this station
